commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hey there.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Welcome! Hey, what's with those mikans?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: They're Numazu's specialty, and I wanted everyone to have a mikan dish.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Like a mikan dessert?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Frozen mikans are delicious.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Those are pretty tasty, but mikan hotpot is to die for!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Mikan hotpot? I can't imagine how that would taste.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Is that seriously any good?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: It certainly is! Right, You?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Yeah, it's delicious. Then there's mikan soup, mikan hotpot udon, mikan salt ramen.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Mikan ramen?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Ahh, you're all skeptical, aren't you? It's fantastic, okay. Everyone loved it the last time I made it.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Yeah, some people even wanted seconds.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Well, if you talk it up that much I'm kind of curious.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: One bite, Honoka, and you'll be begging for more.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: I kind of want to try some after hearing all that.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Don't just have some, have a lot!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: W-Well, I'll believe in you, then.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: That's the spirit. Those who believe will be saved.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: So, while I'll make that dish, I also want to try a new one, too.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You're getting really into this, huh Chika?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I can't fall behind you, Ayumu!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Then what kind of new dish are you thinking up?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: How about juice that's a mix of mikans and mikans? I just know it'll be delightful!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Yeah, that sounds great.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Wait, that's just mikan juice!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: W-Wait, you're right!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Ahaha! Oh, Chika!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Well, I'll create something that'll make everyone groan in surprise!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Groan, huh?
